content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step following the classification workflow. ## 1. TEXT EXTRACTION The document appears to be a letterhead with company information from Aerosupport S.A.S. It contains a shareholders composition certification (Composición Accionaria) dated June 24, 2021. The document shows: - Company name: Aerosupport S.A.S. - Tax ID (NIT): 800.216.686-2 - Address: Avenida El Dorado N. 103-08, Entrada No. 1 INT. 20, Bogota, Colombia - Contact info: Phone numbers and fax - Date: June 24, 2021 - A statement from the legal representative (German Salgado Vergara) certifying the shareholder composition - A table showing the shareholder structure with: - Identification numbers - Shareholder names - Number of shares - Nominal value - Paid capital - Ownership percentage - The shareholders listed are: - German Salgado Vergara (49.50%) - Global Aviation Support Corp (49.00%) - Adriana Arango Jaramillo (1.00%) - Nicolas Salgado Arango (0.50%) - The document is signed by German Salgado Vergara as the legal representative ## 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - Not BLANK: The document contains substantial text and meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY: There are no hyperlinks as the primary content ## 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION - The document is issued by the company itself (Aerosupport S.A.S.) - It is not issued by DIAN or a Chamber of Commerce - It is signed by the legal representative of the company ## 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS - The primary function is to certify the ownership structure of the company - It lists shareholders with their respective ownership percentages - It provides exact share counts and percentage participation - It is certified by the legal representative ## 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION Reviewing the categories in order: - Not CECRL: This is not a personal identification document - Not RUT: This is not a tax registration document issued by DIAN - Not CERL: This is not a certificate of existence issued by Chamber of Commerce - ACC: This document shows shareholder composition with percentages - this is the main purpose - Not RUB: This is not a DIAN report about beneficial owners - Not POR_REVISAR: The document has a clear purpose and fits ACC category ## 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION Strong evidence for ACC classification: - Clear shareholder terminology: "Composición Accionaria" - Ownership data in specific format (shares and percentages) - List of owners with their identification numbers - Percentages of ownership clearly stated - Certification by legal representative - Focus solely on share ownership structure This document is clearly a shareholder composition certification (ACC) as it details the ownership structure of Aerosupport S.A.S. with specific percentages, share counts, and shareholder details.
